Text: Very Interesting Book. What British voice was used to read the book?  Well people can also read the book in their web browser here.   http://www.subvertednation.net/protocols-of-elders-of-zion/

The voice is IVONA UK Brian.

But there is even a better version of Protocols in modern English, which is the same text as this one, available on torrent:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6463014/NWO__ZioNazi__Matrix__Illuminati__Freemason__Secret_Societies_Vo

That one has much better articulation and phraseology and is much easier to understand.
Plus it is in US English. It uses Paul 16 voice from Neospeech, the best voice there is.
